website_summaries.verdict: A quality appliance with a history of mold issues that may or may not have to do with improper cleaning by owners.
pros: A mini food processor with an excellent reputation for quality
cons: When not cleaned properly, mold can grow in the steaming compartment

customer_reviews.title: Black particles in food!!!
customer_reviews.text: After cleaning this product according to the manufacturer's instructions, the heating coil became extremely corroded and began to get black and white particles into my baby's food. I took this Cuisinart baby food maker apart and the heating coil looked disgusting. Check out my pictures. I only got 5 months of use out of this product. So much for using it for more than one child! Cuisinart would not replace it and did not seem to care that their product had contaminated my baby's food.
customer_reviews.author: CloudyinWI

customer_reviews.title: Mold in the item. Not acceptble.
customer_reviews.text: I understood this product to be used in very good condition. Mold in the steamer compartment is not what I expected. This item does not function at all in steam mode. The description was that the packaging would be damaged, not the product. Also it did not come with a booklet. The item was used so much that the blade is damaged, the color was wrong, I ordered the pink one. THE MOLD. This is the first time I have eve received an item in such terrible condition.
customer_reviews.author: momighty

customer_reviews.title: Small but effective
customer_reviews.text: My only complaint is the size. The product works great, it's easy to use and clean (so far, only a month in). I make my baby food in large batches and freeze individual servings though, and it takes three cycles to prepare a full butternut squash and two for a head of cauliflower. If it didn't take so many more dishes I'd probably just use my instant pot and food processor.
customer_reviews.author: Online Shopper Extraordinaire

customer_reviews.title: This makes great pureed ANYTHING
customer_reviews.text: This was great for us as first time parents. It made making food for our kiddo so easy and we continue to use it now that he's almost 3 years old. We often make pureed parsnips for dinner instead of mashed potatoes and our kid love them as much we do. The only downside is that the bowl seems to crack if washed in the dishwasher.
customer_reviews.author: Robert T Florence

customer_reviews.title: Useful for a busy mom
customer_reviews.text: I've used the heck out of this machine and for the most part I really like it. After months of using several times per week, it does seem like the motor is starting to struggle. The plastic parts are also showing ware. I've never used the bottle warming feature and you could definitely get the same, if not better, result from just steaming your own foods and throwing them into a food processor. I know my regular food processor has a far better motor than this. BUT - for a convenient all-in-one baby food maker, this is extremely easy to use and does a great job without the extra step.
customer_reviews.author: Jessica M

customer_reviews.title: Two big flaws
customer_reviews.text: I like most most things about this product. There are two major issues: (1) After the food is steamed the blade needs to be re-positioned for the blender to work. This is extremely annoying because it means removing the (hot) food, taking the pieces apart and cleaning the machine. I think it's the result of condensation that gets between the blade and the motor. After wiping the post that comes through the motor it generally works. This sometimes doubles the active time it takes to make the food so it's a huge flaw for a busy mom. (2) The post/motor of the blade gets a yucky black residue from each use.
customer_reviews.author: Liz C.

customer_reviews.title: I was very disappointed with this food processor
customer_reviews.text: I was very disappointed with this food processor. I had it for 2 months, and then the steamer stopped working, I tried trouble shooting it, and thought it was my outlet, so I tried all outlets and it did not work, but the processor did. So, I decided to return and ended up with a regular 23$ Hamilton food processor [8 cup] rather than this one. Trust me I had high hopes.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Has to be the best thing my mother n law ever got me
customer_reviews.text: Has to be the best thing my mother n law ever got me! This ting is AMAZING and makes my life so much easier making my sons baby food. Steam and blend its that easy. Even comes with several recipes. LOVE THIS!!! HIGHLY RECOMMEND!
customer_reviews.author: Blessedbygrace

customer_reviews.title: We use this daily, no mold issues if you take proper care
customer_reviews.text: This has been the best little gadget ever. It's so quick and easy to make baby food - either in a large batch to freeze, or throughout the day as needed for each meal. I haven't had any mold issues - but just in case I make sure to always store it open, without the water measuring cup.
customer_reviews.author: Sagra

customer_reviews.title: HORRIBLE
customer_reviews.text: It made me crazy mad as a first time parent with it working one second and it not working the next. I took good care of it and cleaned it after every use (which only happened to be 3 times) - emptied the water each time to avoid mold. It was horrible hearing my baby scream out of hunger because I couldn't get this thing to work. After much research I learned that it is just better to steam the old way unfortunately.
customer_reviews.author: EuLoV

customer_reviews.title: so I love this cuisinart simply because it steams and chops and ...
customer_reviews.text: Ok, so I love this cuisinart simply because it steams and chops and makes my job so much easier! The only complaint I have is that metal stick that goes in the bowl, for some reason shaves the metal off the inside of the blade when being used. Also, the inside of the bowl (the grey part) gets stained. Like mine is orange from the carrots. But overall I think it's a great product and I'm really happy I bought it! Oh yea, it's a bottle warmer too! I had no idea when I bought it! Lol I don't use it now but maybe for my second baby.
customer_reviews.author: Lucie

customer_reviews.title: Product stopped working - awful return policy
customer_reviews.text: I loved this product until it stopped working. The returning process was tedious and costly so I am not sure what to do now. Definitely do not recommend this brand because of lack of support in case of malfunction.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Water leaks while steaming, plastic part snapped in half...
customer_reviews.text: I was no able to get used to this gadget... I'm not sure why is it so difficult or what am I doing wrong... The water keeps leaking while I'm trying to steam vegetables, the cycle is not long enough for the veggies to be properly steamed... The plastic ring on the circular knife broke ( snapped), while I was blending fresh cranberries to make juice.... Just a bad experience overall...
customer_reviews.author: Natalia F.

customer_reviews.title: Great for Making Baby Food
customer_reviews.text: This was one of the best things I got to help make baby food. Keep the manual handy as it is a must read since it gives the water requirements for several kinds of foods. The only complaint is that the blade piece doesn't automatically snap down in place when the lid is closed so I just have to make sure it is secure every time I close the lid. I though the unit was broken until I figured this out.
customer_reviews.author: G Unit

customer_reviews.title: I LOVE THIS!!!!
customer_reviews.text: I absolutely love this. I thought for a really long time and debated on whether or not to buy this. I just wasn't sure if it was worth the extra money vs. the baby bullet and some of the other baby processors. The cuisinart is about double that of the baby bullet. I can tell you...it IS definitely worth the money! It is so simple. Literally, all you have to do is cut up the veggies or fruit, add the water, and then turn it on to steam. After that, flip the switch to puree. This is an awesome thing to have if you want to make your own baby food. Can't recommend this product enough!
customer_reviews.author: Laura

customer_reviews.title: Wonderful Product
customer_reviews.text: I have only used the baby food maker part of this product (we already owned a bottle warmer) and it works wonderfully. I have made sweet potatoes and carrots so far. It was very easy to use. The booklet tells you the amount of food to put in the processor and how much water to use. The unit automatically stops when the steaming is done and then you turn the knob the other direction to puree it. I know that food can be steamed on the stove and then blended, but I was looking for convenience. This is VERY convenient. I am very happy with my purchase.
customer_reviews.author: Ali

customer_reviews.title: Great product
customer_reviews.text: I've owned for about 3 months now. Super easy to use. I love that it will steam, puree and warm a bottle. Update: daughter is now 15 months old and we still love this. When I want to steam carrots for her dinner or chop up spinach to add to something this product works great!
customer_reviews.author: Emily

customer_reviews.title: Ok
customer_reviews.text: Only thing I've notice is that the inside of the blade the plastic flakes wo I'm gonna buy a new blade if I can because I dont need that going into my babies food
customer_reviews.author: Kay

customer_reviews.title: Great Purchase!
customer_reviews.text: Bought this as a gift for my son and daughter-in-law. Purchased it, along with the book, '201 Organic Baby Purees' by Tamika Gardner, and OXO Tot Baby Food Freezer Trays. I'm very happy with each item. The baby isn't born yet, but my daughter-in-law has already been practicing with the baby food maker and recipes. She is really happy to have it and looking forward to using it on a regular basis. I rated this 4 stars only because the bottle warmer hasn't yet been tested. It got mixed reviews, but even if it isn't ideal, I won't feel like my money was wasted... the baby food maker is excellent.
customer_reviews.author: jazzandshine

customer_reviews.title: Great in theory
customer_reviews.text: I bought this to make food for my first daughter. I questioned the steamer chamber but the first couple months it worked great! Made the process extremely easy! However toward the last few months of using it for my first daughter, I felt like chunks of who knows what was coming out into the purée. I was diligent about cleaning out the chamber with vinegar however I pulled it out to use with my second child, and ran this 3 times with black coming out and then steamed sweet potatoes and saw black through out the purée. I question how clean you can actually get the steam chamber without being able to look inside.
customer_reviews.author: G. Jeffery

customer_reviews.title: Makes it really easy to make your own baby food
customer_reviews.text: Mine is two years old and going strong. I used it with my first baby now two years later with my second. It allows you to make bigger batches the most baby food makers. The fact that it steams it and then you purée it in the same machine is also very helpful, cuts down on cleanup. Makes it really easy to make your own baby food.
customer_reviews.author: jal

customer_reviews.title: practiced with some organic carrots and was amazed at the result
customer_reviews.text: I ordered this as a gift for my friend who does not know how to cook and the mere thought of making her own baby food had her in a panic. I plugged it in for her, practiced with some organic carrots and was amazed at the result! Her baby was just being introduced to solids- unsuccessfully I might add- and ate the pureed carrots. This is super easy to use, I highly suggest it for any new parent! Making your own baby food really can't get any easier than this. Great price too, especially for Cuisinart. If I ever decide to squeeze one out, this will be the first item on my registry.
customer_reviews.author: Teresa

customer_reviews.title: Good Product
customer_reviews.text: I bought this product a few months ago and it still works like a charm! The only complaint I have is how long it takes between steamings. I like to do a mass food-making session once a week but end up having to wait 20+ minutes for the steamer to cool down after each use; which is not a huge deal, but when I'm in the zone, I just want to prepare all the food, steam it, puree it and be done- not draw the process out for a couple of hours just waiting for it to cool down between foods. Other than that, it works great and I have had no issues! Overall I definitely recommend it.
customer_reviews.author: roxyzgirl

customer_reviews.title: it is amazing! Only one bowl to clean
customer_reviews.text: I know why this product rates #1... it is amazing! Only one bowl to clean. Makes perfect baby food. Steams bottles, veggies and purees food to perfection. I usually use all of the liquid from the steam to make the baby food the perfect consistency for stage 1 food.
customer_reviews.author: 3Teens&aBonusBaby

customer_reviews.title: Easy, affordable and delicious baby food!
customer_reviews.text: This baby food maker is simple, and does exactly what I need it to! There are two options: steam & chop - even I cannot mess this up. It makes preparing my baby's food mindless and convenient! I prep all of the veggies, throw them in, put it on steam, and when the light turns off, pulse and blend a few times with the "chop" option, and I'm done! I love knowing exactly what I'm putting into my baby's food - it's a great feeling, especially with so much extra junk in store bought food. I give this 5 stars and would recommend it for any parent.
customer_reviews.author: LFG

customer_reviews.title: Great for steaming baby food and regular veggies for adults! Purees food consistently.
customer_reviews.text: This is a wonderful tool for steaming both the babies food and our veggies for dinner. We have gotten a lot of use out of this. The booklet it comes with is a great reference for knowing how long to cook different items and the amount of water to use. Simple to use, basically dummy proof. Have not had any issues with it. Purees the babies food very well.
customer_reviews.author: Amanda M

customer_reviews.title: Easy to use, great results.
customer_reviews.text: My wife and I absolutely love this baby food maker. It allow us to easily prepare natural, home-made meals that our baby eats eagerly and it is so easy to use that encourages my wife to be creative with mixes.
customer_reviews.author: Luis M. Serrano

customer_reviews.title: Not really necessary
customer_reviews.text: We don't use the bottle warmer, and I've found through my experience that my daughter prefers her food baked, steamed, or cooked on the stove as opposed to using the steaming option on the Cuisinart. (Even when following the recommendations provided in the manual, most of the purees turn out watery.) So basically, we just use the chopper and any food processor could work for that. I still use it at least once a week, but I will probably go buy a larger processor as I start to make larger batches of food.
customer_reviews.author: B. Erickson

customer_reviews.title: Good quality!
customer_reviews.text: I gave it four stars on easy to use, because if you don’t cook you may need to print off or display amount of water used for various foods. I cook everyday, so I would know you would need more water for sweet potatoes vs peas. Also if you are using for various items in one session, you will have a hard time getting it to steam back to back without the machine cooling down.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great Baby Food Maker
customer_reviews.text: I decided to make my own baby food and after doing a lot of research via watching product videos and reading reviews I decided to purchase this baby food maker. I am so happy with this product it is easy to use and practical. I love being able to steam and puree the food all in one. I have recommended it to several of my mommy friends and they are fans as well. I've never used the bottle warmer so I cannot comment on that feature. It is compact and you're able to store it in a cupboard or leave on the counter.
customer_reviews.author: Bere33

customer_reviews.title: perfect
customer_reviews.text: made all of my sons food for the first year, and still use to make apple sauce when we go picking. We would have to make a few batches of food bc it only holds about three chopped apples, but it's great that it steams & chops all in one. and is dw safe.
customer_reviews.author: mrs

customer_reviews.title: Works great 3 years later
customer_reviews.text: I love the two in one steamer and purée. There is some wait time in between batches so that the machine can cool down. I usually will pour cold water into the water compartment and pour it out to cool it down (I do this twice in a row).
customer_reviews.author: Davidson

customer_reviews.title: It's great.  No complaints.
customer_reviews.text: I bought this baby food maker about a month ago, after reading quite a few reviews. It's great. It functions exactly as described, and it's easy to clean. After reading the other reviews, I worry about mold. I wash all of the removable parts after each use, and I turn the machine upside down to get rid of excess water. I also leave the top door open when the machine isn't in use. So far, so good.
customer_reviews.author: frannyglass

customer_reviews.title: Great baby food maker
customer_reviews.text: This is the first baby food maker I purchased and it has been so great. My friend recommended it and it has lived up to her advice! Its great because you can steam and puree in one unit. Easy clean up!
customer_reviews.author: Kas W

customer_reviews.title: This has been the best investment I've ever made
customer_reviews.text: This has been the best investment I've ever made!!! It's an all in one deal! I do everything with it and super fast and easy. Love it!!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great appliance
customer_reviews.text: Makes making baby food at home much easier. Rather than having a pot of water to steam food and a blender to puree it, you can do all all in one with much less effort. Once you get the food steaming you can walk away and come back after it is done. You then puree it, and the blending works very well to to this. Can make several meals worth in one batch of you wanted to as well.
customer_reviews.author: Dan C.

customer_reviews.title: Mom and baby both love it
customer_reviews.text: Really is the absolute best thing we have bought for our little guy. We pick up an assortment or organic produce and chicken and make the most amazing assortment of yummy goop for baby to enjoy. I must confess that I make sweet potato and butternut squash for myself and this machine just steams it to perfection and mixes it up to a velvety consistency. I'm sure we'll still be using it long after baby has moved on to real food!
customer_reviews.author: Peenuts

customer_reviews.title: finally used it!
customer_reviews.text: We're just about to start solids for my little one and I made a few batches of pureed baby food this weekend. It is very easy to use and easy to clean. I was originally worried the plastic would stain, but it has not as of yet. I made yellow squash, carrots, and sweet potato. All came out perfectly. I highly recommend this if you are wanting to make your own baby food.
customer_reviews.author: April A.

customer_reviews.title: MUST HAVE
customer_reviews.text: Makes life so much easier! A must for everyone who cooks babyfood on their own!
customer_reviews.author: Susanne

customer_reviews.title: seriously?
customer_reviews.text: was purchased and yet when the steamer was used, It did not even steam for the first time, just died, immediately, did not even get a single use out of it.
customer_reviews.author: KatiyaKoriVX

customer_reviews.title: Disappointed
customer_reviews.text: If I could give zero stars I would. This product was not easy to use, terrible to clean & emitted a strange burning rubber smell when mixing. Don’t waste your money.
customer_reviews.author: Daniela D'Angio

customer_reviews.title: Great baby food maker
customer_reviews.text: Wonderful for making baby food - very simple and convenient. Use it to make all of my baby's food. Okay for heating Dr. Brown's bottles. Hard to clean. Also bought the accompanying baby food containers. Lids don't fit properly.
customer_reviews.author: Susan B

customer_reviews.title: Best product for parents with babies!
customer_reviews.text: Best purchase we made after having a baby. It makes larger portions, steams, and purees. We highly recommend this product over all other baby food makers. It is great that we can steam in here and then puree it and we only have to do this once a week, not every day- because it makes multiple portions. Easy clean too!
customer_reviews.author: Lauren

customer_reviews.title: I have other Cuisinart products and they are much better quality then this food maker
customer_reviews.text: We got this steamer about six month ago to make food for our baby. We were using it about twice a week. About two months ago small crocks started show show up in the bowl and it started to leak. I have other Cuisinart products and they are much better quality then this food maker.
customer_reviews.author: Sasha

customer_reviews.title: I am so glad I went with this one
customer_reviews.text: I bought this when I needed to warm my daughters bottles but knew eventually I would be making her baby food. I am so glad I went with this one. We are now to the baby food stage and it is a breeze! I also am grateful that the parts are dishwasher safe.
customer_reviews.author: Brandi L Diehl

customer_reviews.title: One of the best baby purchases I have made
customer_reviews.text: One of the best baby purchases I have made! So easy to use, and we still use it all the time even though the little squirt is past the point of needing purees. It is great just as a steamer. The bottle warmer takes forever but we have a separate one so we don't need that function.
customer_reviews.author: becka

customer_reviews.title: As advertised.
customer_reviews.text: We have been using it for several months for fruits and veggies for baby. Works just as advertised. Very happy with it.
customer_reviews.author: Michelle Nicole

customer_reviews.title: Worth the price!
customer_reviews.text: You really can't go wrong with Cuisinart! I love the idea of a mixer that steams and purees baby foods. The lid/blade can be somewhat of a pain to align (you have to do it just right or it won't steam). It's well worth the price compared to other baby food makers. Mine has lasted through two babies in the last 2.5 years.
customer_reviews.author: Liz

customer_reviews.title: Baby Food Maker
customer_reviews.text: Excellent buy. My daughter-in-law uses it constantly for our grandson. Loves the food.
customer_reviews.author: Belen B.

customer_reviews.title: Love
customer_reviews.text: Loved using this for my infant as well as making homemade purée for other recipes
customer_reviews.author: Jennifer

customer_reviews.title: Not durable and costly to replace.
customer_reviews.text: The steam function broke after a few months of use. We also didn’t get much use of the bottle warmer as it took forever to warm up. Talked to customer service, and they sent me a new one with warranty. However, it costed me $30+ to simply send the old one back. Not the return policy I would expect at this day and age.
customer_reviews.author: TZSSMD

customer_reviews.title: I LOVE this baby food maker
customer_reviews.text: I LOVE this baby food maker! I made all of my daughter's baby food when she was younger and now use it to make purees to fill reusable food pouches. It is the only baby food maker I have found that both steams and purees the food in one thing. It's SOOOOO incredibly simple. After the food is done steaming, the machine stops automatically and you just flip the knob and pureed it to the desired consistency. SO easy!
customer_reviews.author: Hali

customer_reviews.title: Used twice and broken
customer_reviews.text: Plastic is flaking off and a black substance is leaking from the inside of the blade spinner.
customer_reviews.author: Derek

customer_reviews.title: Good tool for home made baby food
customer_reviews.text: We have used this to make all our baby food and it has been great! You still have to clean it, but there is no way around that, although the cleaning process is very simple. Good quality food and you control what goes into you baby food, without the need for several food pots and pans.
customer_reviews.author: Rafael Ramos

customer_reviews.title: Perhaps it's best for younger babies
customer_reviews.text: Sent this to my son and daughter-in-law for their baby. However babies are now being encourages to "chew" even before their molars are in, so pureeing food may not be necessary. It seems that many babies go directly from the breast to soft solids. Perhaps it's best for younger babies.
customer_reviews.author: Anne Griffin Lefer

customer_reviews.title: Works great and is very easy to use
customer_reviews.text: This baby food maker has become priceless to us. We make all of our sons food with it and steamed his bottles with it as well. Works great and is very easy to use. Not only do we know exactly what is in his food, but I think it has saved a ton of money over buying premade baby food.
customer_reviews.author: juts

customer_reviews.title: Great baby food maker
customer_reviews.text: I suppose a baby food maker is not a necessity, but if you're looking for one this is great! I love that you can steam and puree in one container. We've used it to make vegetable sides for us as well! It works very well and is easy to clean.
customer_reviews.author: Jenny

customer_reviews.title: but I love the steaming and pureeing options
customer_reviews.text: I haven't used the bottle warmer option on this product yet, but I love the steaming and pureeing options. It has made making homemade baby food for my daughter easy and fast!
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: Easy to use & clean
customer_reviews.text: I have been using this now for about a month. I am thoroughly impressed with how easy it is to use & clean. I am so happy I chose to go this route instead of the baby bullet.
customer_reviews.author: T. Lax

customer_reviews.title: Love this product!
customer_reviews.text: Very easy and convenient to use. I just chop up fruits and veggies and toss them in there. I don't have to worry about over or under cooking them because it automatically turns off when the food is done steaming. I feel so much better giving my baby natural food, knowing exactly what goes into it.
customer_reviews.author: Ashe

customer_reviews.title: Never disappointed.
customer_reviews.text: I send one to every niece and nephew at the birth of their first child. Never disappointed.
customer_reviews.author: J. B. Gale

customer_reviews.title: Cuisinart BFM-1000 Baby Food Maker and Bottle Warmer
customer_reviews.text: One of the best functions in the product is that you can steam and puree the food in the same container. Time saver and no mess. Quality of the product is great. The receipe booklet with the processor is also helpful. We use the recepies mentioned in the booklet for our 7 months old son. overall highly recommended. I do not know what we would do without it!
customer_reviews.author: Khushwinder Bedi

customer_reviews.title: I love this baby food maker
customer_reviews.text: I love this baby food maker. It steams, chops and purées all in one. Makes making baby food from scratch so easy
customer_reviews.author: Mommy Poppins

customer_reviews.title: easier to use a food processor after steaming the food
customer_reviews.text: Have to play with it a bit sometimes to make it go one.
customer_reviews.author: Kate Waesche

customer_reviews.title: I love how this makes making my baby homemade food so ...
customer_reviews.text: I love how this makes making my baby homemade food so much easier and convenient. It's a good size so it makes a good portion for freezing a large batch. It's easy to clean and use. I'm glad I invested in it. Well worth it
customer_reviews.author: amazonlover

customer_reviews.title: This has been my favorite baby gadget
customer_reviews.text: This has been my favorite baby gadget! So easy to use and we are saving a ton on baby food. It steams and chops, which is better than the more popular baby food makers. Highly recommend!!
customer_reviews.author: John LaPierre

customer_reviews.title: Missing items from box
customer_reviews.text: Now unboxing item and there is NO spatula or instruction/recipe book included!!!!! Beware!!!!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: I really wanted to like this baby food maker
customer_reviews.text: I really wanted to like this baby food maker. It was smartly designed and it was Cuisinart. However, mine never worked properly. I returned two unit before giving up.
customer_reviews.author: ShopGirl

customer_reviews.title: So Helpful
customer_reviews.text: If it were not for this item I would not have been able to keep up with home made baby foods. I work 40 hours a week and found the Cuisineart was the perfect size to make a batch of each fruit and vegetable to last through the work week!
customer_reviews.author: Abigail Rivera

customer_reviews.title: Love it!
customer_reviews.text: I love it! I made a decision to make my baby food puree. This is amazing so easy. I can make it a month of supply of baby food in one day. I tried it. Super easy, easy instruction. You put the vegetable or fruit you want. Let it steam and then puree. Super simple and healthy food for my daughter!
customer_reviews.author: Jeff&Hajar

customer_reviews.title: Best purchase!
customer_reviews.text: Just received this in the mail. For the first 2 months I tried to do it by myself using a regular old blender. It worked just fine. But this baby food maker is so much faster and takes way less time. I am recommending this to all my friends and family who have little ones! It's amazing!
customer_reviews.author: Kayla

customer_reviews.title: perfect for little infants into toddler ages
customer_reviews.text: love this little food maker I've had it for about 6 months now and it works great! it steams all veggies perfectly and you don't have to transfer to another container to blend. I am still going to be using this as he gets older to steam soups and veggies!
customer_reviews.author: Jaz

customer_reviews.title: ... reviews before deciding on a food processor and definitely happy with my choice
customer_reviews.text: I read a lot of reviews before deciding on a food processor and definitely happy with my choice! I haven't used the bottle warmer, but the steamer and chopper does a great job and pureeing baby food!
customer_reviews.author: jodimae

customer_reviews.title: Perfect untill steam function quit
customer_reviews.text: Never used the bottle warmer function but the steaming and cutting worked perfectly at first. But after 7 months an edge of the cover broke with the little piece that engages the blender function, I put it back manually and it still worked. But now the steaming function quit. Gonna try to return it.
customer_reviews.author: arlin

customer_reviews.title: One Star
customer_reviews.text: Doesn't heat bottle warm enough, has burning smell after a little over a month of use
customer_reviews.author: Drew Martens

customer_reviews.title: 0 stars!
customer_reviews.text: 0 stars. Don't buy this item! I Have tried two of these and had to return them both for same problem, bowl and blade get jammed and are impossible to take apart. Both times it was after 3rd use, brand new. Even when I called cuisinart, they had problems when testing the product.
customer_reviews.author: Amy K.

customer_reviews.title: This was the best thing that I bought when I had my baby
customer_reviews.text: This was the best thing that I bought when I had my baby. I felt at ease knowing that my daughter was getting no preservatives in her food. It puréed wonderfully with no clumps
customer_reviews.author: Hssbug

customer_reviews.title: Three Stars
customer_reviews.text: Broke after 6 mos of use. Just quit working. Expected more from Cuisinart.
customer_reviews.author: C. Santana

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Makes making baby food so easy and I don't need to constantly check it.
customer_reviews.author: Keith Beaufort

customer_reviews.title: Absolutely love it!!
customer_reviews.text: Bought this to introduce solid food to my 7 months old baby. The bowl, blade, measuring cup, the unit itself, everything is high quality solid build. The bowl is super easy to clean and rinse. The puree texture is so smooth and evenly chopped. It's worth every penny. Love it.
customer_reviews.author: Wing

customer_reviews.title: this thing is amazing. we are always using it to make our ...
customer_reviews.text: this thing is amazing. we are always using it to make our baby fresh food. could not be any happier with this product
customer_reviews.author: mike

customer_reviews.title: Great baby food maker
customer_reviews.text: Bought this for my daughter to use for our granddaughter, she loves it. Steaming and blending in the same bowl is a time saver. Steams several different vegetables and fruits and them mixes them together for a variety of tastes for baby. It is also compact, so it does not take up a lot of counter space.
customer_reviews.author: Gilda

customer_reviews.title: Fantastic Product!
customer_reviews.text: This is easily the best all in one baby food maker on the market...it steams the food, then purees it in the same container; so easy to use you actually enjoy the process
customer_reviews.author: Edward G. Morris

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: I love this product ! Steams, chops, puree - just excellent and easy to CLEAN!!!
customer_reviews.author: PUG LADY

customer_reviews.title: I love, love, love my baby cuisinart!
customer_reviews.text: It's so easy to use. I just chop the food up, pour the water in, and then start the steamer and walk away. After about 20 min I check on it and puree the food. It's also so easy to clean. I have a dishwasher, but it's so easy to clean, I've only put it in the dishwasher once.
customer_reviews.author: Sara E. Thielen

customer_reviews.title: Worth the money!
customer_reviews.text: Love this product! So glad we bought this one. We make our own baby food and this does the job. It also comes with an instruction manual on what you need to do to make your baby foods so you don't have to google them.
customer_reviews.author: swanprincess05

customer_reviews.title: I love that you can just steam and process in the ...
customer_reviews.text: Made life much easier for parents! I love that you can just steam and process in the same container. Saves a lot of time and effort.
customer_reviews.author: LAC

customer_reviews.title: Excellent baby food maker
customer_reviews.text: After much research, I chose this to make my little one's baby food. I am so pleased with my decision! It does everything all in one (steams and purees) and has a bottle warmer as an added bonus. The direction booklet even has recipes in it! Perfect product!!
customer_reviews.author: Sunni Elizabeth Yates

customer_reviews.title: Great product!
customer_reviews.text: This is the first time I am making baby food and I have to say that this product makes it quite easy! Steams quickly, purees well, and cleans up easily. I haven't used the bottle warmer, but I don't really need it. Would definately recommend!
customer_reviews.author: David

customer_reviews.title: this was good when I used it to prepare food for my ...
customer_reviews.text: this was good when I used it to prepare food for my little ones. but now I do not need it. it a great tool for a while.
customer_reviews.author: Nagi

customer_reviews.title: Great item
customer_reviews.text: Very convenient and useful for busy parents as it steams and purées in the same bowl. The recipe booklet is very handy, especially for parents who are most starting to give solids and wonder what consistency a particular item should be.
customer_reviews.author: Anastasia Cordova

customer_reviews.title: I'm no make baby food  yet  is good warmer
customer_reviews.text: I'm only us de warmer I'm not mak baby food yet
customer_reviews.author: Deysi bada

customer_reviews.title: Present
customer_reviews.text: I bought this product for my sister and for the past year she has thanked me several times for buying her this food maker instead of the other one that she request.
customer_reviews.author: YAY

customer_reviews.title: Highly Recommend if you are Making Your Own
customer_reviews.text: Highly recommend! Everyone said making baby food takes so long. This works great. The chart in the book tells you how to prepare most foods. Then u add water and the steaming takes 20 min on avg. I can make 2-3 diff foods in an hour!
customer_reviews.author: Tonia Weis

customer_reviews.title: Great for Baby
customer_reviews.text: Excellent product. I not only use it for baby food, but for making smoothies for me and my husband, and salsa, too. It's easy to clean (just use vinegar), and I love how you can take care of steaming and blending in one machine. Innovative and convenient.
customer_reviews.author: Miss Franz

customer_reviews.title: Better than the other brand
customer_reviews.text: I also have a competing brand "high-end" baby food steamer/maker, a rice cooker, & a food processor. I can honestly say that the Cuisinart baby food maker is much more convenient than any of the aforementioned devices. It holds an adequate amount of cut veggies/fruit for several more 2 oz portions of puréed foods than my other baby food maker and it's all-in-one design is super convenient. A must-have for people who wish to make their own baby food.
customer_reviews.author: L

customer_reviews.title: bought as a present
customer_reviews.text: I bought this for my daughter who has twin infants. It is to replace a cheaper make. My daughter really likes this one . . . and so do her babies.
customer_reviews.author: David Thatcher Wilson

customer_reviews.title: good product
customer_reviews.text: well made machine. easy to understand, easy to work, easy to clean. in my opinion after purchasing a few of these machines this is the best machine ive run across
customer_reviews.author: CLOPEZ93

customer_reviews.title: Fave baby device
customer_reviews.text: Love this baby food maker!! It's so easy to use & makes good thoroughly puréed food. My fave baby device!!
customer_reviews.author: Elizabeth

customer_reviews.title: Great product!!
customer_reviews.text: Does everything it says...warms bottles perfectly and steams and chops baby food.
customer_reviews.author: Jules

product_meta.title: Cuisinart BFM-1000 Baby Food Maker and Bottle Warmer
product_meta.description: Color:WhiteA fast and easy way for parents to turn the foods they choose into healthy meals for baby, the unit steams and purees in the same bowl. A 4-cup work bowl means lots of leftovers, which can go right into the refrigerator or freezer. A built-in bottle warmer heats baby's bottle to just the right temperature. Includes Cuisinart Baby recipes in the recipe booklet as well as a spatula, bottle adapter ring and integrated measuring cup. *******NOTE: The manual has very detailed instructions on how to use it and also has a troubleshooting guide page 6-9. ************* Features: Steam chop/pureé and bottle warmer functions|4 cup work bowl|Patent-pending Bladelock System holds the blade in place while pouring|Steam blade creates even steam distribution for quicker more efficient results|Bowl seal to prevent spitting and improve steaming|User-friendly dial control with LED indicator light|Powerful motor for quick steaming and precise chopping|Recipe booklet spatula bottle adapter ring and integrated measuring cup included|18-month limited warranty
feature_bullets: Steam, chop/pure and bottle warmer functions; 4-cup work bowl
Patent-pending blade lock system holds the blade in place while pouring. This appliance has an automatic shutoff safety feature - turns unit off when water has evaporated
Steam blade creates even steam distribution for quicker, more efficient results
Bowl seal to prevent spitting and improve steaming; powerful motor for quick steaming and precise chopping
Recipe booklet, spatula, bottle adapter ring and integrated measuring cup included; 18-month
User-friendly dial control with LED indicator light
